body:
Comment 3 by **bgarcia@golang.org**: 
First screenshot shows what I see when I first load
http://talks.golang.org/2014/c2go.slide on a Nexus 5.

Second screenshot shows what happens when I resize vertically without paying attention
to left/right position.  Swiping from this point keeps the slide split right in the
middle of the screen.

Trying to one-finger reposition the page does nothing but go to the next or previous
slide.  Instead, you need to use a two-finger resize to actually move the page.

If I do position a slide in the middle of the page, then things work fine if I swipe to
the left to advance to the next slide.  However, if I attempt to slide right to go back
a slide, then the slides are again no longer centered.
Attachments: 1. Screenshot_2014-05-12-15-24-13.png (88923 bytes) 1. Screenshot_2014-05-12-15-24-31.png (67527 bytes)
